middleContent.description: IAFCertSearch is a global database used to validate and verify the status of accredited certifications issued by certification bodies worldwide. It helps businesses, governments, and consumers confirm the legitimacy of management system certifications, ensuring transparency and trust in global supply chains.

rightContent.roleDescription: My role in this company is to develop and maintain features

middleContent.description: The Cadet Information System project is a centralized platform where historical and current cadet data are digitized. This system empowers academy staff to efficiently create, retrieve, update, and archive cadet information.

IntelliDocs is a project where all university documents are centralized and digitized. The system enabled teachers and staff to efficiently create, retrieve, update, and delete documents. The system allows users with access to: create a template, request for approval, approve, print documents, and many more.

rightContent.roleDescription: I was one of the key developer in this project as I was one of the developer who fully implemented the backend system for this using Node.JS and one of the frontend designers as well.
